title: having trouble with turning my idea a to visual reality.
content:
Its actually pretty difficult to explain. I was wondering if someone would be generous enough to open up iChat, add my user name: Britishdancparty, and IM me so that we can talk about it? Its a pretty complicating problem and Im mainly looking for someone who can give me an honest opinion + design idea..

Thanks!
author: Ken W

comments.content: I would, but the idea is just so... big. I think It'll be easier if I'd explain it in parts; Ichat.
but dirtcastle, do you have an ichat account? I think it'll only take 30 mins...
but dirtcastle, do you have an ichat account? I think it'll only take 30 mins...

i don't have an ichat account. i'm not a big chatter.

don't take this the wrong way, but 30 mins w/o any info is a bit much. i would want to know if i would even be helpful before plunking time. you can hit me up offline.
dirt castle may I get your email address?
just sent it via typophile acct
